Text: Thanks a lot: this movie is a hidden gem!

One of the finest sci-films ever made!!!

You will see how this film influenced Douglas Adams' 'Hitch Hikers Guide to the Universe'.

A must have film for any sci fi fan.......
Thank you for this. So cool. "Phemonology!" "Doolittle, Doolittle, what the hell are you doing?"

One of my old time cult favourites - such a pleasure to find it here.
THANK YOU ddickie
:O))
Thankyou so much. It's Alan Dean Foster's story, so it's got to be top notch. Can't wait to see it.
Thanks a bunch!  Didn't think I'd be able to find this old gem.  BTW, its not Alan Dean Foster's story, he adapted Dan O'Bannon & John Carpenter's script to write the novel.

love this movie!!
saw it just once several years ago..
now I'll see it again!
many thanks ddickie
Thanks man! When I finish download, I will keep seeding for a long time. This film deserves it.
I've seen this classic movie a bunch of times over the last 30 years. It'll be great to get my own copy of it. Thanks a lot for putting it up! ;^)
Thanks mucho!  This one is a keeper!
